# About


## About the Lab

Welcome to the Green Teams R Lab!

This document will help you and your team use R to complete your projects over the course of the summer.
Before we get started, please make sure to download R and RStudio so you can follow along with the examples given in this Lab.

Instructions on how to download R are available on the next slides.
